text: 12.9 2 Ko 11.30, Plp 4.11-13, 1 Pi 4.14 Yɨp pen agak, Yad nep yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gen, tap anɨb ak nep anɨgɨl gɨnɨmuŋ agak. Nɨŋɨd apin, bɨ kɨles ne ma mɨdeb ak, kɨles yad ak tap awl yɨbɨl nop ameb agak. Bɨawl anɨb agek, mɨñɨl yad bɨ kɨles ma mɨdeb tek mɨdɨl, anɨb ak nɨŋɨd mɨñmɨñ awl gɨpin. Pen Klays kɨles ne ak yad ayɨp mɨdɨl, yɨp yu gɨnɨmuŋ.
